ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/10/99 2:31:55 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... languages), ... A reasonable place for all places to meet that is semi-central is the tunnel
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/10/99 2:31:55 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
poobot@... writes:

> Being a Dark Elf, I am born with a good understanding of Elder Tier'Dal as
> are my brothers and sisters. As you may be able to find one of us who is
> willing to teach you (as I would be in return for learning other
languages),
> it will be most difficult for us to sit under protection of the round ears,
> or for our Dragoon's to tolerate the same ilk.
>

A reasonable place for all places to meet that is semi-central is the tunnel
to north ro in East commonlands. There is a large open area where a merchant
sells VERY expensive magic weapons :) In this room you are away from all
monsters... The people with the longest trips to there are of course the
Erudites.

Sonoroud, Dark Elf Necromancer
